title: Poster, 1969
medium: Offset lithograph on textured white wove paper
inscribed: Lower left on edge in red: Design Georges Calame VSG / Claude Dupraz SID / Designers Associates   Photo. albert Rey   Offset  Roth + Sauter SA
description: A non-objective photographically produced image of a sharp protusion into material at the center of the sheet with tones gradiating from total black at lower left to light gray at upper right. Title superimposed in black ink across top of sheet. Text reads, dybs 69 design à Yverdon.  Above at left, in red, hôtel de ville / 7 juin - / 3 août 1969 / biennale / suisse / industrial design

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1969.
1969. Offset lithograph on textured white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-195.
